high_descs: Walk forward to the cardboard box then turn right and walk to the wall then turn left and walk to the dresser.
Pick up the tiny pencil that's in front of you to the left of the statue on top of the desk.
Take a step backwards then two steps left please so you are facing the garbage to the left of the desk.
Turn on the lamp that's on the desk to your right.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pencil by lamp light.

high_descs: Walk past the mirror on your left, then turn to your right and go to the small space between the desk and the bed, then turn towards the desk on your left.
Pick up the pencil on the top shelf of the desk, to the left of the statue.
Turn to your left and go to the corner of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the top shelf of the desk, to the right.
Walk forward to the empty box on the floor, then turn right and walk across the room to the desk by the wall.
Pick up the pencil on the top shelf of the desk, behind the key chain.
Turn left and walk to the left side of the desk and stand to the left of the lamp on the top shelf of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp.
